timeline.bodyText: minor: there is a leftover reference to NodeIOService in MockServer:134
timeline.author: vbekiaris

timeline.message:
Renamed IOService to ServerContext

This is in line with e.g NioNetworking.Context. The context contains
the dependencies for some service.

timeline.author: tkountis
